name: English
common.wellcome_message: Hi! I'm Sally, How can I assist you today?
common.sponsor: I got fired. Can you sponsor me $5 for a hamburgerüçî? God bless you!üôè
common.sally_placeholder: Chat with me Or @ agent to help you.
common.openai_setting_notes: You can use Sally Chat by free using your OpenAI Key,you can get one at this link OpenAI.
common.gemini_setting_notes: You can get the Gemini API Key at this link Gemini AI.
common.license.desc: You can sign up on our website for a License Key ,Sign Up üöÄ.
common.tool_placeholder: Input your requirements and select the tool you want to use
common.not_support_tools: Sorry, this model doesn't support using tools.
common.inside_tool_tip: Select the text in the document and use the following tools.
common.prompt_tip: Here are your saved prompts. Click to quickly send them to Sally.
common.not_set_api_key: No API key has been set for the current model. Please verify and set it up.
common.clear_history_tip: Are you sure you want to clear the chat history? This action cannot be undone.
common.history_alert: All chat history are stored in local storage, once you clear history, all chat history will be lost.
common.temperature_description: Controls the randomness of the output. Lower values make the output more deterministic and predictable, higher values make it more diverse and creative.
common.maxtokens_description: Limits the maximum length of text generated. Higher values allow for longer responses but may increase response time and cost.
common.apikey_tip: For security reasons, your API Key is stored in local storage. We recommend using models from OpenRouter, including GPT-4o-mini, GPT-4o, Claude 3.5 Haiku, Claude 3.5 Sonnet, and DeepSeek V3.

sheet.menu.data_context_tip: Show the data context of the current chat
sheet.agent.analyst.short_description: Analyze data and generate analytical reports.
sheet.agent.knowledge.short_description: Use your pdf/word/text or sheet as a knowledge base!.
sheet.agent.intelligent.short_descriptio: Build prompt with row data to generate content, do summaries, Q&A, sentiment analysis and other tasks.
sheet.agent.sally.placeholder: Please select the data range first, then tell me your requirements
sheet.agent.filter.short_description: Help you filter data by conditions, store data to other sheets.
sheet.agent.coder.short_description: Run  Google Apps Script code to edit spreadsheets.
sheet.agent.coder_excel.short_descriptio: Generate code and run it in Excel.
sheet.context.no_header_alert:
Heads up! If the headers cannot be found, I may not be able to provide accurate answers, to find the headers of the table, I suggest:

1. Select the data range of the table, including headers.
2. Make sure the header has only one row.
3. Do not select empty data range.

After selecting the table range, click on retry button to recheck.
sheet.context.check_is_fine: Table header check completed. Here are the headers I found: {{headers}}. If incorrect, please manually select the table range for rechecking. If everything looks good, would you like me to provide data analysis suggestions?
sheet.context.check_data_tip: Help you check if the current data range is correct and will generate three data analysis suggestions.
sheet.agent.sally.choose_tool: Hi, I'm Sally. Choose a tool and chat with me.

agent.sally.choose_tool: Hi, I'm Sally, chat with me or use the tools below:
sheet.context.sample_data_tip: Only table headers and first 2 rows will be sent to Sally.
sheet.context.sample_data_suggestion: When generating pivot tables or using the code interpreter to edit and summarize data, it is recommended to use the Sample Data option.
sheet.context.full_data_tip: All data rows selected will be sent to Sally.
sheet.context.full_data_suggestion: When you want Sally to process the table data directly, it's recommended to use the Full Data, but be mindful of the data size.
